response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, and I am confident it will bring similar benefits to you. Given its worth to both parties, I propose a transaction price of $900,000 for this unique item.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents a strategic investment that could potentially yield substantial returns. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to discussing this further with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
